name: Rock, Paper, Scissors, SMASH!
description:
Gather up 3 people to play the fighting game version of Rock, Paper, Scissors. Each player must kill their opponent by running into them while avoiding being killed themselves. Remember: Rock beats Scissors, Scissors beat Paper, and Paper beats Rock

Controls: WASD keys for Rock, IJKL keys for Paper, and  arrow keys for Scissors

This is my submission to Weekly Game Jam 154 with the theme of Rock, Paper, Scissors and the game was made in about 3 days.

I'm excited to release this for my first game jam ever. It would mean a lot to me if you could rate the game and leave some feedback. Enjoy!
